title: Strengthening Stake Pools in Africa
description: Stakepools in Africa are subject to outages and infrastructure issues on top of the general risks faced by SPOs

title: Cardano-Heartbeat (CEM) 💞
description: Power Failure, Network Disruptions & Hardware Failure can happen at any time to SPOs, many are not prepared for such events.

title: CardSec 🔒
description: There is a need for a 101 stake pool security guide and testing tools for stake pool owners and dApps running Cardano nodes.

title: Blockfrost prometheus exporter
description: SPOs need blockchain metrics from a 3rd party source to be able to react on discrepancies with their local node.

title: Cardano Disaster Recovery Education
description: Not enough proposals to "Disaster: When all is at stake". Proposers discouraged by lack of understanding and awareness, not lack of funding.

title: Stake Pool Reachability Dashboard
description: When a network failure occurs, it would be useful to know which SPO are reachable from different locations in the world.

title: Repository of SPO Testing Resources
description: Small pool operators do not have a central place where they can find tools and information to test their stake pool.

title: SPOCRA: Re-location Fund for SPOs
description: Adversarial regulation being passed into law is becoming more real making previous legal SPO businesses unable to operate legally.

title: ADA SPO ITsec Label
description: In a decentralized world, you need a label that you can trust. It is important for companies and service providers.

title: A.S.T.O.P. - Stop Scams & Threats
description: Charles Hoskinson is sick of scams harming Cardano ADA, he wants a proactive group to find ways to stop them for all stakeholders
